###Taking part in a survey?

**Social surveys**

General information about ONS social surveys and the A to Z of social surveys have further details about social surveys. You can also call the freephone Survey Enquiry Line:


Tel: + 44 (0) 800 298 5313 

(Minicom users should dial 18001 before this number) 

Open 9am to 9pm Monday to Thursday 
9am to 8pm Friday  
9am to 1pm on Saturday

**Business surveys**

General information about ONS business surveys and the A-Z of business surveys have further details about business surveys.

Email: bdd.respondent.feedback.team@ons.gov.uk

Please include a contact telephone number, in case we need to clarify your enquiry.

Do not use this email address to provide data. We are unable to guarantee the confidentiality of all data sent to us by email. Please return data by using the fax number on the front of the survey, or by post to: 

Office for National Statistics, Room A012, Government Buildings. Cardiff Road,  Newport, South Wales, NP10 8XG.
